member.name: LVFOOTERINFO
member.summary: Contains information on a footer in a list-view control.

member.name: LVFOOTERINFO.mask
member.summary: Set of flags that specify which members of this structure contain data to be set or which members are being requested. Currently, this value must be LVFF_ITEMCOUNT, for the cItems member.

member.name: LVFOOTERINFO.pszText
member.summary: Not supported. Must be set to zero.

member.name: LVFOOTERINFO.cchTextMax
member.summary: Not supported. Must be set to zero.

member.name: LVFOOTERINFO.cItems
member.summary: The number of items in the footer. When this structure is used to get information, this member will be set by the message receiver.
